description:
Flirtey is the leading drone delivery service. We are reinventing the on-demand economy with our network of flying robots for last mile delivery. Our mission is to save lives and change lifestyles by making delivery instant.

Flirteyâs drone delivery service is faster, more efficient and the ultimate customer experience. Weâre rapidly growing our team and achieving a record number of historic firsts in the drone delivery industry, advancing autonomy, safety systems and advanced delivery technology.

If you are interested in having your goods delivered via Flirtey, or joining the team that is transforming the delivery industry, visit www.flirtey.com 

Recent Company Milestones:
- October 2017 â Announced a partnership to launch the first automated external defibrillator (AED) drone delivery service in the U.S.
- January 2017 â Raised $16 million in Series A funding from top Silicon Valley investors.
- August 2016 â Launched the worldâs first commercial pizza-by-drone delivery model in partnership with Dominoâs.
- July 2016 â Conducted the first fully autonomous, FAA-approved drone delivery from a store to a home in partnership with 7-Eleven. 
- June 2016 â Completed the first fully autonomous, FAA-approved ship-to-shore drone delivery in collaboration with Johns Hopkins. 
- April 2016 â The Flirtey drone used to make the first FAA-approved delivery in the U.S. accepted into the Smithsonianâs National Air and Space Museum, alongside the Space Shuttle Discovery and the Wright Flyer. 
- March 2016 â Conducted the first fully autonomous, FAA-approved urban drone delivery in the U.S. 
- July 2015 â Completed the first FAA-approved drone delivery on U.S. soil in collaboration with NASA Langley Research Center.
- Summer 2015 â Graduated Y Combinator.
- 2013 â Founded the first drone delivery service in the world.

Chất lượng hình ảnh Full HD sắc nét, âm thanh sống động và đường truyền ổn định, giúp bạn tận hưởng trọn vẹn từng khoảnh khắc của trận đấu. Bên cạnh việc cung cấp link xem bóng đá chất lượng, trang web còn sở hữu đội ngũ bình luận viên chuyên nghiệp, am hiểu sâu sắc về bóng đá. Những màn bình luận hài hước, sôi nổi, cùng với những phân tích chuyên môn sâu sắc sẽ khiến bạn không thể rời mắt khỏi màn hình.
Ngoài ra, **Xôi Lạc Trực Tiếp** còn là nơi quy tụ một cộng đồng fan bóng đá đông đảo, nơi bạn có thể chia sẻ niềm đam mê, thảo luận về các trận đấu, cũng như kết nối với những người cùng sở thích.

Với sự đầu tư mạnh mẽ vào bản quyền phát sóng các giải đấu lớn nhỏ trên toàn thế giới, trang web mang đến cho người xem một kho tàng trận đấu phong phú và đa dạng. Bằng việc ứng dụng công nghệ trực tiếp bóng đá hiện đại nhất, **Xoilac Live** đảm bảo chất lượng hình ảnh, âm thanh sắc nét, cùng tốc độ truyền tải ổn định, giúp bạn tận hưởng những giây phút xem bóng đá tuyệt vời nhất.
Không chỉ vậy, trang web còn sở hữu đội ngũ bình luận viên chuyên nghiệp, giàu kinh nghiệm, mang đến những nhận định, phân tích sâu sắc, giúp bạn hiểu rõ hơn về trận đấu. Flirtey, now branded as SkyDrop, is pioneering the world of drone delivery as the first commercial service of its kind. Founded in 2013 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2015 batch, Flirtey is headquartered in Reno, NV and operates with a team of 11 innovators. Their mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to transform the on-demand economy using autonomous flying robots to streamline last-mile delivery. They aspire not just to deliver goods but to save lives and enhance lifestyles by making deliveries instantaneous.

The company's journey has been marked by a series of noteworthy milestones that underscore its leadership in the drone delivery industry. Here are a few highlights:

- **April 2016**: Flirtey's drone made the first FAA-approved delivery in the U.S., earning a spot in the Smithsonian’s National Air and Space Museum.
- **July 2015**: They achieved the first FAA-approved drone delivery on U.S. soil in collaboration with NASA.
- **August 2016**: A partnership with Domino’s saw the launch of the first commercial pizza delivery by drone.
- **October 2017**: They announced a groundbreaking partnership to deploy the first automated external defibrillator (AED) delivery service via drone in the U.S.

With continued advancements in autonomy, safety systems, and delivery technology, Flirtey is not just keeping up but is setting new industry standards. They emphasize speed, efficiency, and an exceptional customer experience, making it clear that the future of delivery is airborne.

For those intrigued by the potential of drone technology or keen to join the team at Flirtey, more information is available at [Flirtey’s website](https://www.flirtey.com).

Flirtey's story isn't just about tech; it's about vision—redefining how we think about deliveries, and in doing so, influencing the very fabric of our daily lives.
